https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/u1uCegidpYpC1JQx9V7LvqZD8LF.jpg Aanai is a 2005 Tamil language film released in India. It stars actors Arjun Sarja, Namitha Kapoor, Vadivelu, Sanghavi and Manoj K. Jayan. It is a loose remake of the 2004 Hollywood film Man on Fire starring Denzel Washington. It Consider a hit and the soundtrack score well Aanai
